functions.title: BOE Vol 12

§lLuck of the Sea I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a waterlily (R) as the reagent. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lLuck of the Sea II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a sea pickle (R) as the reagent. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lLuck of the Sea III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of seagrass (S), a sea pickle (P), and a piece of kelp (K) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
SPK§r

§lLure I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a raw cod (R) as the reagent. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lLure II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a raw salmon (S) and a tropical fish (T) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).

 B 
S T§r

§lLure III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a turtle egg (T) as the reagent. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
